title: Clothes
description: New or lightly used clothes can go a long way to keep someone warm and dry. Any piece of clothing can be helpful, especially socks!
subDescription: The name of the org sounds like 'Socks' for a reason

title: Towels
description: Towels can be used for a variety of different purposes from staying dry to cleaning.

title: Bedding
description: Sleep is an important part of staying healthy and grounded. Pillows, blankets and sheets can go a long way.
subDescription: Can't get on your feet without good sleep

title: Canned Food
description: Non-perishable foods are easy to transport and store. No one can go without nourishment, even if refrigeration is not available
subDescription: No one deserves to go hungry

title: Pet Food
description: People from all walks of life keep pets. Just because someone is down on their luck doesn't mean their pets should go hungry
subDescription: Cats and Dogs deserve to eat too

title: Snacks
description: Canned food requires work to prepare, like making a fire to heat food up. Snacks are a great way to fight hunger in a hurry
